value_claims.claim_description: Holcim reduced concrete delivery times by 7 minutes per load using HERE's real-time smart navigation and location intelligence on AWS, improving efficiency and reducing wastage of time-sensitive concrete.
value_claims.source_quote: With 6.4 million loads delivered globally, and a 7-minute cut in delivery time, Holcim is delivering stellar customer service while paving the way for a cleaner future.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The delivery time reduction is directly attributed to HERE's location technology and real-time smart navigation built on AWS, which optimized routing and provided real-time visibility.

value_claims.claim_description: Holcim saved over 800,000 hours across 200,000 job sites globally through optimized routing and real-time navigation enabled by HERE location services on AWS.
value_claims.source_quote: Using HERE solutions on Amazon Web Services (AWS), Holcim has benefited from global availability and resilience, saving over 800,000 hours across 200,000 job sites and delivering 6.4 million loads of concrete on time.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time savings are directly attributed to HERE solutions on AWS that provided smart routing, real-time visibility, and navigation optimization for concrete deliveries.

value_claims.claim_description: Holcim successfully delivered 6.4 million loads of concrete on time globally using the ConcreteDirect app powered by HERE location technology and AWS infrastructure.
value_claims.source_quote: Using HERE solutions on Amazon Web Services (AWS), Holcim has benefited from global availability and resilience, saving over 800,000 hours across 200,000 job sites and delivering 6.4 million loads of concrete on time.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: On-time delivery performance is directly enabled by HERE's real-time smart navigation and location intelligence on AWS, addressing the time-sensitive nature of concrete with 90-minute shelf life.

value_claims.claim_description: Between March and October 2020, Holcim completed nearly 500,000 touchless customer deliveries using the ConcreteDirect app, maintaining construction activity safely during the pandemic.
value_claims.source_quote: The digitization was particularly useful at the height of the COVID-19 pandemic. The app kept construction activity going with nearly 500,000 touchless customer deliveries between March and October 2020 without compromising the need for social distancing.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The ConcreteDirect app's digital features enabled touchless deliveries through real-time tracking, transparent communication, and electronic ticket generation, directly supporting pandemic safety requirements.

value_claims.claim_title: Elimination of seven paper ticket copies per delivery
value_claims.claim_description: ConcreteDirect replaced seven copies of paper tickets with automatically generated electronic tickets, advancing sustainability and streamlining last-mile delivery processes.
value_claims.source_quote: The app has streamlined last-mile delivery and advanced sustainability by replacing seven copies of paper tickets with electronic ones. These are automatically generated and emailed to the customer once the delivery truck leaves the gates.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The automated generation and digital distribution of electronic tickets is directly enabled by the ConcreteDirect app's integration with HERE location services and AWS infrastructure.

value_claims.claim_title: Real-time visibility and two-way communication for order fulfillment
value_claims.claim_description: ConcreteDirect provides customers with clear visibility and direct communication channels for every phase of order fulfillment, from booking to real-time delivery truck tracking.
value_claims.source_quote: ConcreteDirect has addressed both the perishable nature of concrete and Holcim's sustainability commitment by leveraging real-time process visibility and direct, transparent two-way communication with customers.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Real-time visibility and communication capabilities are directly enabled by HERE's location technology integrated into the ConcreteDirect app, running on AWS managed services.
